  • Deprecated Interfaces 
    Interface and Description
    com.dotmarketing.portlets.files.business.FileAPI
  • Deprecated Classes 
    Class and Description
    com.dotmarketing.osgi.AbstractViewToolActivator
    Class initially used to register ViewTool objects from and OSGI plugin, now you should use the GenericBundleActivator class instead of this class to register those ViewTool objects using the method GenericBundleActivator.registerViewToolService(org.osgi.framework.BundleContext, org.apache.velocity.tools.view.ToolInfo).
    com.dotmarketing.portlets.files.model.File

    com.dotmarketing.portlets.templates.factories.TemplateFactory
    com.dotmarketing.servlets.image.TitleImage

    Method and Description
    com.dotmarketing.beans.Inode.addChild(Inode)
    Association between inodes should be called through their respective API, calling the API ensures the consistency of the relationship and caches
